stories.text: Hello, A short while ago there was a post here about an program that creates windows or macOS containers on linux, that had seamless integration with the host when it comes to gpu passthrough etc. Can somebody give me the name of the program? Thanks in advance.
stories.title: Windows Containers on Linux

The untold story behind Apple's $13,000 operating system (2013)

stories.text:
= COVID

When people think lying is better than death, no matter how clearly you point out a lie, they never see it, because the consequence, they believe, is death

When the WHO said masks were ineffective, did they believe it? Unlikely. We based our lives on that information, and accused those who didn't

The consequence of lying is deathly -- it breaks down trust, as truth is lost in a sea of misinformation, aswell as in misplaced assurance and certainty

When COVID first spread, other than for example New Zealand, every nation said "We have plans in place, we are sure we are safe, we don't need to stop travel." It turns out they were completely wrong... But now they are completely right

Hypocrisy hastens death's coming, but blinds us to it. I want us to face future problems in unity and trust, together. So we face death

Before COVID two members of my family died from routine injections. One my grandfather, and one a lady who wanted to give her child to us for adoption. Nothing is without risk. Vaccination injections on balance being the most sensible option is a different argument to saying they are completely safe

A small lie? Lies kill, and if not misinformation, it is a dynamo that drives it

We are all post reason: the age where truth is what we want it to be. We ask our politicians to decieve us. If they spoke the truth, we would change the channel

Stop lying Face death

For a time is coming when people will no longer listen to sound and wholesome teaching. They will follow their own desires and will look for teachers who will tell them whatever their itching ears want to hear

They say to the seers, "Stop seeing visions!" and to the prophets, "Do not prophesy to us the truth! Speak to us pleasant words; prophesy illusion

More to say, but you are not ready to hear
stories.title: Covid
